alert.note: Alert for Crowley; El Paso; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 5:27PM MDT until May 24 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern El Paso County in east central Colorado... Northwestern Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 527 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Truckton to 7 miles east of Boone, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
